actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to allow persons receiving retired pay for the length of their service in the armed forces of the United States to concurrently receive any pension or compensation under the laws administered by the Veterans' Administration which they are entitled to.

summary.text: Permits certain veterans with service-connected disabilities who are retired members of the uniformed services to receive compensation concurrently with retired pay, without deduction from either.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to allow persons receiving retired pay for the length of their service in the armed forces of the United States to concurrently receive any pension or compensation under the laws administered by the Veterans' Administration which they are entitled to.
